inclusion.criterion: suspected by Plain X-ray to have shoulder instability
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previously underwent surgical intervention to shoulder joint for any reason
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of fracture repaired by metal plates or screws
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has scoliosis and back pain, but no other medical conditions. He is a candidate for scoliosis surgery.
